page.title: 03POPULATION
page.content:
Frinton especially has seen a huge increase in the immigration of pensioners, and consequently, the Frinton/Walton area has the highest number of elderly people in the whole of Essex, with over three times the national average.
The age structure is however more balanced in the centre of Walton. This is a result of the fact that houses in this area are less suited to elderly inhabitants. It includes large houses, rather than bungalows, bed and breakfast establishments, and flats situated above shops.
The large excess of deaths over births due to the imbalanced age structure has given rise to small families in the area compared with the rest of Essex.
